meanings.definition: A drink, especially an alcoholic one.
meanings.sent1: After work, he enjoyed a bevvy with his friends at the pub.
meanings.sent2: The party had a wide selection of bevvy for the guests to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The bevvy at the party made everyone dance like they were in a music video.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a fizzy bevvy on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cocktails looked like a rainbow of bevvy options.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things.
meanings.sent1: A bevvy of birds gathered around the feeder in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together like a well-oiled bevvy to finish the project.
meanings.sent3: The bevvy of books on the shelf seemed to be having a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled in the sky, forming a sparkling bevvy above.
meanings.sent5: The children formed a bevvy of laughter and joy in the playground.
